ARABIC: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when he said to his father and his people, 'What do you worship?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When he asked his father and his people: "What do you worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when he asked his father and his people: "What do you worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Tell them the story of Abraham,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When he said to his father and his people, “What do you worship?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When he said to his father and his people: "What do you worship"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When he said to his father and his people: What do you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when he said to his father and his people, 'What do you serve?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When he said unto his father and his folk: What worship ye?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when he asked his father and his people, "What is that which you worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When he said unto his father and his people: what worship ye?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when he said to his father and his people, ‘What is it that you are worshiping?!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, he said to his father and his people: "What worship ye?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When he said to his father and his people: "What do you worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said to his father and to his nation: 'What do you worship'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When he said to his father and his people, “What do you worship?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:70] when he said to his father and his people, ‘What do you worship?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When he said unto his father) Azar (and his folk) the idol worshippers: (What worship ye) Abraham said to them: what do you worship?
